game_description: Grapple and boost your way through a procedurally generated world. Swing from cube to cube to fly as far as you can. The cubes disappear as you go, so move quickly and don't forget to use you grip boosters! Grabble is a new arcade style VR game with a growing community and is available on AppLab while we test the core mechanics. Please join us on discord or twitter to share your experience. We are a team of two developing Grabble on nights and weekends and your feedback and support means the world to us! Grabble On!
review_1: (Edit) Ok, after playing this for a while, I think this game is really good! Once you get the hang of how the grapples work, you can be swinging lightspeed. I think there should be more backgrounds and color palettes. It would also be cool if there were better game modes, for instance, one where you have to dodge lethal cubes. Final thing, is the music. I don't like how you can only choose from two different songs.
review_2: I suppose. Probably not the best grappler, I dunno. I liked it.
review_3: I don't get very far I don't know it's me but there's not enough time to grab or the grabber don't work well. Need a update.
